WorkItem.Description:
4.0.20b, default item cache
 
The way you acquire the Stormrider's Spaulders is incorrect in the default item cache.
 
iLevel 359 Stormrider's Spaulders (60289) source shown as
 
   purchaseable with 1 Mantle of the Forlorn Vanquisher
      and 1 Stormrider's Spaulders
 
This is incorrect, the 359 item doesn't require you to trade other shoulders in.
 
Refreshing from Wowhead fixes this one.
 
(Also claims the item drops from heroic Cho'gall, which may or may not be true; Wowhead doesn't have heroic drop data for this boss.)
 
 
 
 
iLevel 372 Stormrider's Spaulders (65193) source shown as
 
   purchaseable with 1 Shoulders of the Forlorn Vanquisher
 
This is incorrect, the 372 item *does* require trading in the lower shoulders.
 
(Also claims the item drops from normal Cho'gall, which is clearly incorrect)
 
Refreshing from Wowhead *does not* fix this one.
